title: The Great Gatsby
description: A tale of love, wealth, and the American Dream, set in the Roaring Twenties.

title: To Kill a Mockingbird
description: A story about racial injustice and moral growth in the American South.
A chilling depiction of a totalitarian regime and the loss of individuality.

title: The Catcher in the Rye
description: A story about teenage angst and alienation narrated by the iconic Holden Caulfield.

title: Sapiens: A Brief History of Humankind
description: An exploration of the history of humankind, from the Stone Age to the present.

title: Becoming
description: The former First Lady's journey from her childhood to her role in the White House.

title: The Hobbit
description: The adventure of Bilbo Baggins as he embarks on a quest to reclaim treasure from a dragon.

title: A Game of Thrones
description: The first book in the epic series about power struggles among noble families in the Seven Kingdoms.

title: Gone Girl
description: A suspenseful tale about the disappearance of a woman and the secrets that unfold.

title: The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo
description: A journalist and a hacker team up to solve a decades-old disappearance.

title: The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo
description: A journalist and a hacker team up to solve a decades-old disappearance.

title: Educated
description: A memoir about a woman who grows up in a strict and abusive household in rural Idaho but eventually escapes to learn about the wider world through education.

title: The Silent Patient
description: A psychological thriller about a woman who shoots her husband and then stops speaking.
